name: The Wizard Returns 2
description:
The Wizard is an action platform game which mix’s action with rpg. It is very
simple to play with basics movements. You can use different weapons as well,
consumable items and more. This new version gives the game infinite posible
levels where you can face gravity, magic chests, different enemies and much
more.

The game still in development process and will be change in the future, please leave a comment what feature you like to see in this game.
